divs: Sighting Details I WAS GOING OUT MY BACK DOOR TO RETRIEVE SOMETHINGFROM MY CAR AND GLANCED UP AT THE SKY THINKING ABOUT WHAT A BEAUTIFUL DAY IT WASGOING TO BE WHEN I NOTICED A JET APPROACHING FROM THE EAST AND TO THE RIGHT OFIT A METALLIC STARLIKE OBJECT THAT FADED IN AND OUT OF VISION AS IT CAUGHT THESUNS REFLECTION.THE OBJECT PASSED THE JET ON THE RIGHT. IF I COULD MEASURE ITWITH A TAPE MEASURE IT WOULD BE ABOUT 2 INCHES AWAY FROM THE JET. IT QUICKLYPASSED THE JET AND WAS LAST SEEN ABOUT 6-8 INCHES OUT IN FRONT OF THE JET ANDSTILL TO THE RIGHT. IT FADED OUT OF SIGHT AND I DID NOT SEE IT AGAIN.IT REMINDEDME OF TWO VEHICLES ON A FREEWAY ONE QUICKLY OVER TAKING THE OTHER.THE JET HADVISUAL EXHAUST THE OBJECT DID NOT. THATS IT, END OF STORY.
Summary: Metallic object along side of commercial jet.
